DKeep.logic

Class Level_2

  • java.lang.Object
    • DKeep.logic.Level_2

  • public class Level_2
extends java.lang.Object
    Level_2.java - Level 2 class. Creates the objects of level 2. Map, Hero, Ogres and swing. Evaluates level (complete, lost, uncompleted).
    Since:
    2018-04-02
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    André Esteves && Luís Diogo Silva

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level_2

        public Level_2()

    • Method Detail

      • createMap

        public static char[][] createMap()
        Creates the map for level 2. Like a matrix, char[][]. Size of 9x9. X -> wall. I -> Closed door. S -> Open door. A -> Hero without key. K -> Hero with key. k -> key to unlock the door. G -> Guard.
        Returns:
        map of level 2, char[][] variable.

      • createHero

        public static Hero createHero()
        Creates the Hero for level 2 on his correct position. Hard coded. On the position [1,7] of the current map.
        Returns:
        Hero of level 2.

      • createOgre

        public static Ogre createOgre(char[][] map)
        Creates one Ogre in the given map on a random position with some restrictions.
        Parameters:
        map - Given map (map of level 2) where the Ogre is going to be created.
        Returns:
        Ogre created.

      • ogreMove

        public static void ogreMove(char[][] map,
                            Ogre[] o)
        Movements of Ogres[] o in the given map char[][].
        Parameters:
        map - Map where Ogre is going to move.
        o - Set of Ogres created in the beginning.

      • swingMove

        public static void swingMove(char[][] map,
                             Ogre[] o)
        Position of swing of each Ogre.
        Parameters:
        map - Map where the swing is going to be set.
        o - Set of Ogres created in the beginning.

      • evalStatus

        public static int evalStatus(char[][] map,
                             Hero h,
                             Ogre[] o)
        Evaluates the status of the current level.
        Parameters:
        map - Map char[][] of current level.
        h - Hero of the level.
        o - set of Ogres of the level.
        Returns:
        0, if no end game reached. 1, if victory condition reached, level 1 completed. 2, if defeat condition reached, level 1 lost, got caught by any Ogre's swing.
